poll_info.title: NuggMD Cannabis Consumer Poll - CBD and Cannabis Rescheduling Sentiment
poll_info.methodology: Digital questionnaire sent to opt-in list of verified cannabis consumers via NuggMD.com first-party data

questions.question_text: Last weekend, the president posted a video touting the benefits of CBD for seniors. Some have speculated that this means the administration has decided to reschedule cannabis -- which would finally acknowledge that the plant has potential medical benefit -- while others say Trump posts about a lot of issues without necessarily signaling policy action. In your opinion, what, if anything, does this news mean for the prospects of rescheduling?

demographics.population: Representative sample of cannabis consumers in state-legal markets
demographics.sample_method: Sourced from independent providers of verified consumer data and first-party data
demographics.verification: Regular cannabis users. A strong majority of the sample reports daily or weekly cannabis use.
